tweet_text: @tomlau @ProteomicsNews @ProtifiLlc @pwilmarth @UCDProteomics @lkpino I posted on this before, FragPipe does not need much. Start with a decent modern HP or Dell workstation for 2-3k, just add more RAM (for a 64Gb or 128Gb total); 2Tb SSD is good for any tool. Can also run on AWS (we plan to start providing pre-built public AWS instances @fcyucn).
text_en: I posted on this before, FragPipe does not need much. Start with a decent modern HP or Dell workstation for -3k, just add more RAM (for a Gb or Gb total); Tb SSD is good for any tool. Can also run on AWS (we plan to start providing pre-built public AWS instances ).
reply_text: I posted on this before, FragPipe does not need much. Start with a decent modern HP or Dell workstation for -3k, just add more RAM (for a Gb or Gb total); Tb SSD is good for any tool. Can also run on AWS (we plan to start providing pre-built public AWS instances ).
